Name: CyanTrigger
Author: CyanLaser
Description: A VRChat Udon compiler that simplifies creating logic while still providing the full power of Udon. Features Event and Action lists with in scene editing. Visually similar to VRCSDK2's VRC_Trigger.

Name: CyanPlayerObjectPool
Author: CyanLaser
Description: A VRChat system that will assign a unique object to every player in the world.

Name: Virtual Gryphon Packages
Author: Nidonocu
Description: Tools for Unity and VRChat projects created by Nidonocu

Name: MMMaellon's Prefabs
Author: MMMaellon
Description: All my prefabs with dependencies
Notes: Each package has it's own listing too that you can access with the three dots menu

Name: Kemocade VRC Data Extensions
Author: Dustuu
Description: This package provides extension methods for the VRChat data types DataToken, DataList, and DataDictionary that allow these data structures to be accessed with type-safe C# Generics and navigated with LINQ-like operations.

Name: Pokeyi's Udon Tools
Author: Pokeyi
Description: A collection of VRChat world-creation behaviours written with UdonSharp. Includes: Omni-Action, Animation Sync, Object Spawner, Player Tracking, Floater Sync, Surface Slide, Haptics Profile, Raycast Laser.

Name: Real Fake Doors
Author: MMMaellon
Description: Doors that you open by grabbing a door handle. Efficient (no update loop while idle), synced, works well in VR and in Desktop. supports hinge and sliding doors. Includes sound effects and react properly to physics interactions and particle collisions.

Name: Miner's Packages
Author: Miner28_3
Description: List of my current and upcoming packages

Name: VRChat API Reader
Author: Dustuu
Description: Exposes tracked information to Udon including VRChat World Stats, VRChat Group Membership/Roles, Discord Server Membership/Roles, Patreon Membership, & Gumroad Purchases.

Name: Magma?s Packages
Author: MagmaMc
Description: Useful packages that can be used to help create VRChat world and avatars

Name: OpenFlight
Author: Mattshark89 / Happyrobot33
Description: OpenFlight is a flight system designed for VRChat worlds, allowing users to fly around just by flapping their hands! Alongside that, the system is setup to automatically detect the avatar you are wearing, allowing for the automatic enabling of flight when you put on an avatar wing arm attached wings. Of course, if your avatar isnt supported, or even just doesnt have wings at all, you can still force the flight system on to enjoy it.

Name: Party Zone Camera System
Author: labthe3rd
Description: Camera controller for worlds that allows desktop player to change cinemachine cameras. Great for recording events, DJ performance overlays, and more!

Name: BluWizard LABS
Author: BluWizard10
Description: Collection of interesting Gimmicks and Prefabs fresh from the kitchen! Contains various Assets such as World UI Templates, Material Presets, and other stuff I may put in here.

Name: VRCNetworkDebugger
Author: Centauri
Description: A Drag&Drop replacement for VRChat's broken networking debug panels, with extra features!

Name: VRCMasterFailureCheck
Author: Centauri
Description:
Drag&Drop prefab that will dynamically
detect when the master stops sending
or receiving network data and fire an 
event to any targeted udon behaviours.

Name: Scaled Collider System
Author: Prismic247
Description: A system that enables worlds to scale players' physical colliders to match their avatar scale, allowing for things like shrinking down and going under a table, or up and stepping over a wall. Contains optional settings for scaling player movement and volume to match.

Name: JetSim - Floating Origin
Author: KitKat
Description: A system for VRChat worlds that mitigates floating point issues by moving the world and player.

Name: DrBlackRat's VPM Listing
Author: DrBlackRat
Description: A listing of all my packages available for use in the VRChat Creator Companion

Name: VRLabs Repositories
Author: VRLabs
Description: Collection of various systems by VRLabs for use in Avatar Creation, converted to VPM-ready Packages.
Notes: Use the website to add any VRLabs Community Repos of your choice to the Creator Companion.

Name: Hackebein's VPM Listing
Author: Hackebein
Description: A listing of all my VPM packages.

Name: Udon Bakery Adapter
Author: Ivaj
Description: A simple bakery adapter, works with volumes and lightmaps
Notes: follow the instructions in the readme

Name: UdonSharpOptimizer
Author: BlueAmulet
Description: UdonSharp post-processor to reduce instruction and variable counts.

Name: Photo Frame Manager
Author: codec
Description: Photo frame manager and optimizer package for Unity

Name: 360 chair for VRChat
Author: iffn
Description: A script that allows desktop players to turn 180ï¿½ in either direction. Especially usefull in vehicles.

Name: Templars Bezier Builder
Author: TWKTemplar
Description: Build Bezier Curves in Unity + API for requesting positions on the points

Name: Instance Version Verifier
Author: Applz
Description: A simple script that can check the instance version against other players who join. This means you can verify that the instance is the most up to date version compared to what the VRChat servers hold!  - If  the instance version is a mismatch it'll set an object of your choosing to active!

Name: Boby's Global FPS Debug Tool
Author: BobyStar
Description:
A simple tool for showing every player's fps and physics tps.
This is a useful tool if you are doing performance tests in your worlds with large groups of players. Like in game worlds where players may be hard to reach or talk to. Or if you just don't want to keep asking what your friend's fps is.
Notes:
VRChat Creator Companion and UdonSharp Required.
Please credit me if used.

Name: Battleshots
Author: tyriadev
Description: Battleshots prefab for free! simple to use, setup and edit

Name: Avatar Scale Control
Author: Realmlist
Description: Allows you to configure the new avatar scaling function in your world.

Name: DateTrigger
Author: N1ghtTheF0x
Description: Animate game objects based on time and/or date of the VRChat Servers

Name: Hash Studios DoorSys
Author: HASH STUDIOS LLC
Description:
Hash Studios DoorSys is a sleek, user-friendly UdonSharp prefab that offers creators the ability to set custom passcodes and create whitelists, ensuring your virtual reality worlds remain secure and accessible to those you choose.

Learn more at...
https://hashstudiosllc.com/hashstudiosdoorsys
Notes:
You may view a YouTube video on how to use this product here.
https://youtu.be/yyU05r6eX6M

Requires:
? UdonSharp

License:
https://www.hashstudiosllc.com/hashstudiosdoorsys/license

Name: Portable Panel
Author: MyroP
Description: A script for a customizable portable panel that can be used in any VRC world. You can use it to create menus, portable video players etc.

Name: VRC AudioShrink
Author: DrBlackRat
Description:
This tool allows you to scale your Avatar to music using AudioLink!
Features:
- Select what AudioLink Band to react to
- Set a default scale
- Set a max amplitude scale
- Safe Zones in which you are unaffected by scaling
- Master Only settings
    - Master Disable (disables AudioShrink for everyone)
    - Master Control (Master sets AudioBand, Default & Max Amplitude Scale for everyone)
    - Sync Settings (AudioBand, Default & Max Amplitude Scale)

Name: Udon Crowd Height
Author: Joker is punk
Description: Define an upper and lower avatar scaling limit, and define 3D spaces where those limits will or will not apply.

Name: Boby's Dual Laser
Author: BobyStar
Description: A simple Drag-N-Drop prefab that allows players to use two lasers with your World UI. Helpful if you have a keyboard or want to enhance multitasking! Included functions for U# for your own usage.
Notes:
VRChat Creator Companion and UdonSharp Required.
Please credit me if used.

Name: STEPPE Keyboard
Author: STEPPE VR
Description:
A customisable multilayout & multilingual keyboard prefab.
Included Layouts:
- 4 English Layouts (UK, US INT, Dvorak, Colemak)
- French AZERTY
- German QWERTZ
- Russian Cyrillic/??????
- Japanese Hiragana
- Hebrew
- Arabic

Name: VRC Simple String Loader
Author: DrBlackRat
Description:
This script adds a lot of additional features to VRChat's String Loader!

It can automatically load them when you enter the World & reload them after a certain amount of time. It allows you to apply the string to Text, Text Mesh Pro and Text Mesh Pro UGUI components. You can also show different strings while it loads and if an error occurs.

Name: Teleport player using GetPosition and GetRotation
Author: Phasedragon
Description:
Teleports the player using GetPosition and GetRotation as the basis for 
the interface, but does all the math to teleport by trackingdata origin 
under the hood correctly. This gives it a solid, reliable teleport suitable 
for seamless teleportation use cases, while giving you an interface that 
still has an easy to use pivot point and forward axis.

Name: VRC ID Gimmicker
Author: sh0ou
Description:
A tool to designate a player to activate a gimmick.
- Manual ID setting / ID setting by URL
- Teleport / ColTeleport / ObjSwitch (Sync / Async)
- Ability to develop your own gimmicks by calling functions in U#.

Name: MultiAudioTrack
Author: N1ghtTheF0x
Description: Play layered audio tracks (dynamic music)

Name: PermissionManager
Author: MagmaMc
Description:
A Framework For Creating Permission Systems For 
Items, Rooms and More

Name: SynMediaPlayer
Author: Synergiance
Description: An advanced Udon powered media player

Name: JetSim - Floating Origin
Author: KitKat
Description: A system for VRChat worlds that mitigates floating point issues by moving the world and player.

Name: VRC-Vending-Machine
Author: BassBoostedDuck
Description: This is a Custom Vending Mechine with 48 diffrent cans, all customiseable by editing the mats for them, if you need help message me on discord: BassBoostedDuck

Name: SAIKSystemPrefab
Author: HardLight680
Description: A VRChat prefab for creating custom in-world IK interactions compatible with most VRChat humanoid SDK3 avatars.

Name: Access Control
Author: OhGeezCmon
Description: Allows a set of predefined Admins to give admin access to a range of game objects. Useful for ensuring only certain players can access certain objects.
Notes: I changed my VRC name from OhGeezCmon to Benediction, use whichever name makes sense for consistency.

Name: Data Debugger
Author: miner28_3
Description: DataDictionary/List/Token Debugger for Parsing and logging DataDict/Lists that include references inside.

Name: MS-VRCSA-Billiards
Author: Sacchan & Neko Mabel
Description: Greatly enhanced fork of the Pool Parlor table, re-written physics, multiple tables, late-joiner support, snooker game mode, customizable.

Name: ArcheryKit
Author: Vowgan
Description: A set of Bows, Arrows, and Targets for adding Archery to your world.

Name: Udon Graph Triggers
Author: Maebbie
Description: 50+ Dependency-Free Udon Behaviours for VRChat Worlds. They cover all essentials and follow a standardized node layout. Only the VRChat SDK is needed to use these!

Name: Nish VRC Boats
Author: Nishjin
Description: A drag-and-drop set of boats that are multiplayer synced. The goal is for them to be easily customizable, as shown in the youtube video linked in the README.

Name: DeacsImageLoader
Author: deac.online
Description: A simple run-time image loader for VRChat worldbuilders using Udon sharp.

Name: BugTesterForVRChat
Author: iffn
Description: A prefab that will automatically test if U# functions work the way they should.

Name: Easy3rdPersonUdon
Author: VoHeLi
Description: Easy3rdPerson - Quick and free way to allow 3rd person in your VRChat Udon world for Desktop players.

Name: Boby's Planet Movement
Author: BobyStar
Description: A prefab that allows players to walk and platform around 3D planets using gravity fields. This system can be used to make space-like platforming worlds, 3D puzzles, and spacecraft multiplayer wars.
Notes: VRChat Creator Companion and UdonSharp Required, Please credit me if used.

Name: Holiday Decorator
Author: Lusif
Description:
Tired of constantly updating for Holidays? 
Fear no more! A simple and easy script that automatically
toggles objects based on Holidays and the 4 seasons.
Additionally, it allows the world creator to specify which
objects and a custom holiday and celebration message.

Spawn custom object(s) for Christmas, Halloween, & more.
These holidays will keep the objects active for several days
before and after so your world visitors will have plenty of
time to check out your sweet decorations! :)

Name: Remote Poster Downloader
Author: Realmlist
Description: Downloads remote images and adds them to a material as a texture.

Name: Fionna's Audio Captions
Author: Fionna
Description: Easy particle effects or screenspace text captions, works with CyanTrigger, Udon, and U#

Name: Real Time Reflection probe Rate
Author: Noch3d
Description: A simple script that allow to update real time reflection at a specific rate in seconds. Perfect for multiples real time reflection probes in a scene and a way to optimize it.

Name: Udon Airtime SwimSystem
Author: Waai!
Description: Integrates Udon Airtime with Hirabiki's SwimSystem
Notes: Maybe this should go directly under Udon Airtime in the list?

Name: VRC Picture Loader
Author: DrBlackRat
Description: This is a simple way to add an VRChat Image Downloader to your world, it provides a user friendly UI to download pictures from the web, shows you how many pictures are already downloaded, tells you when a picture couldn't be download and it lets you manually or automatically download images.

Name: Inventory System
Author: TealDealMeal
Description: Easy to use and fully works out of the box Inventory System for VRChat Worlds!

Name: EmyChess
Author: emymin
Description: Udon Chess Prefab for VRChat
Notes:
The prefab is fully open source under the GPL-3.0 license and all the assets are licensed under CC-BY-SA
Project repo: https://github.com/emymin/EmyChess

Name: Udon Compass
Author: xxlilradxx
Description: Udon script for vrchat SDK3 thats just a simple north facing compass.

Name: Udon Compass Questing System
Author: xxlilradxx
Description: Udon script for vrchat SDK3 thats a simple compass that directs the player towards quest markers.

Name: Dynamic Personalized Spawn System
Author: Aikatsuyuri
Description: Differentiated spawn system that is easily adjustable so players can load into the world in different areas. Specialized option if enabled, also set all player respawn points to their respective starting point.

Name: Music Transition
Author: EvolvedAnt
Description: Enables smoothly transitioning the audio volumes between audio sources playing background music as the player walks through different areas of your world by dynamically lowering/raising audio sources volumes. Can tweak transition duration, curves, target volumes, and whether the audio should start from the beginning of the clip.

Name: SmartObjectSync
Author: MMMaellon
Description: Drop-in replacement for VRC_ObjectSync. Also includes script for attaching things to your body

Name: The Northern Hemisphere Stars Display for VRChat 3.0 Worlds (15 Different timezones display !)
Author: Fuuujin
Description: Prefab maps for the current visible stars on the sky above different locations in the real world.

Name: UdonPortals
Author: aurycat
Description: This prefab lets you create visual portals in VRChat worlds that can be looked through, walked through, fallen through, and appear as high quality as a Mirror. Even pickups can be thrown through the portals!

Name: Flocks system
Author: Aerx
Description: A customizable flocks system oriented towards making creatures dynamically navigate a preset area

Name: VRpg Roleplaying System
Author: Dorktoast
Description: This integration based on Cyan's player object pool adds an integrated world menu, character labels, and dice rollers/randomizers for playing tabletop RPGs and LARPs inside VRChat. Includes a storyteller panel that gives game-runners utilities like teleporting and worldwide announcements.
Notes: Requires UdonSharp, UdonToolkit, and Cyan Player Object Pool

Name: Dynamic Password Locking System
Author: Aikatsuyuri
Description: A dynamically locked door where users within a permission list, can set a password to a door to enable passage quickly! Syncs for late joiners and can easily be reset.

Name: Boby's Layer Mirror
Author: BobyStar
Description: A VRChat Prefab for Worlds needing a highly customizable mirror. UI adapts to layers in VRChat World and each layer can be toggled on/off in VRChat. It also has default High-Quality and Low-Quality LayerMasks. UI dynamically adjusts to the number of layers. Includes setting for showing only used layers or all layers.
Notes: VRChat Creator Companion and UdonSharp Required, Please credit me if used.

Name: FaxPartyPopper
Author: Faxmashine
Description: Pick it up, click to ??

Name: Ice Skating Udon
Author: Joker is punk
Description: Lets players simulate ice skating by modeling momentum and the directional control of ice skates. Movement by leg trackers is included.

Name: iwaSync3 Media Player
Author: Hoshino Labs.
Description: A fully featured media player, with a LOT of options and a neat desktop interface. Supports playlists as well as many other nice features.

Name: VRC-Liars-Dice
Author: akalink
Description: A fully playable game of Liar's Dice that anyone can play. Just drag and drop it into your scene

Name: HOITEX Trombone (Udon)
Author: Hoizen
Description: HOITEX functional Trombone now as a Udon Prefab for Worlds

Name: VRCBlackjack
Author: Centauri
Description: U#1.0+ Only! | Udon Blackjack, play and have fun with your friends!

Name: UdonTotp
Author: Sonic853
Description:
A Time-Based Dynamic Password Lock Implementation (TOTP)
Can be used with Microsoft Authenticator

Name: Fionna's CyanTrigger Keypads
Author: Fionna
Description: A set of customizable keypads: programmable, synced or local, with a variety of models and materials

Name: MalDrum
Author: joebelow
Description: MalDrum drum machine prefab for VRChat

Name: UdonOTPLib
Author: GizmoOAO
Description: VRChat Udon OTP Library. contains a simple time-based one-time password example.
Notes: Make sure you have imported the latest VCC VRCSDK3, VCC UdonSharp and UdonHashLib.

Name: BPM Counter
Author: lightbulb
Description: A novelty BPM counter that works by reading audiolink data

Name: FloatZone
Author: Juice...
Description: This package includes an Udon graph that lets you adjust gravity in trigger volumes. It's made to simulate 0 gravity, but any number will work. You can use any type of collider so long as it has a trigger. Additional options allow you to fire thrusters while inside the trigger.

Name: The Pigeon Prefab
Author: Steve The Mitochondria
Description: Simple drag & drop Pigeon NPCs to liven up a world. Comes with a few behavior variations.

Name: P-Shooters
Author: MMMaellon
Description: Customizable and synced particle guns for beginners. Uses editor scripts to make setup really easy and prefabs for many different types of weapons. Comes packaged with free 3d models by @NatalieDesign (aka Smooth_Octopus)

Name: BitConverter for UdonSharp
Author: Miner28_3
Description: System.BitConverter converted for use in Udon.

Name: Disable Game Object with timer
Author: Realmlist
Description: Disables a game object after the timer runs out.

Name: Toggle Shader Keyword
Author: Realmlist
Description:
Allows you to toggle a specific shader keyword during runtime.
In this use case it's being used to toggle AreaLit on and off.

Name: Udon Stow Points
Author: Toly65
Description: allows the creation of stow points which can attach to the player allowing players to carry more than just what's in their hands

Name: UdonChips Chinchirorin
Author: Xantoz
Description: Chinchirorin is a 2-4 player dice rolling betting game. Package also includes a single player version of the game.

Name: VRCSubtitle
Author: Centauri
Description: U# 1.0+ Only! | VRCSubtitle is a system that allows users to quickly and easily add subtitles to their projects! Designed to be performant and modular, it supports a variety of different subtitle types and use cases!

Name: Voice Booster Interact Toggle
Author: labthe3rd
Description: A voice booster script used in The Party Zone used to amplify a players voice for events!

Name: Global Voice Controller UI [Local]
Author: labthe3rd
Description: A script and basic UI to control voice settings in a VRC World

Name: VRC Bowling SGB
Author: spookyghostboo
Description: Bowling Prefab using UdonSharp. Meshes modeled by spookyghostboo and scripting done by FortisVenaliter. Strike and Spare animation sprites by meathamski.

Name: Boby's Name Tag Pivot
Author: BobyStar
Description:
An automatic pivoting system that can move a transform onto the player's name plate.
It will also scale and appropriately match the player's nameplate size and distance. Useful for displaying quick info like a health bar, race placement, spell status, or if they are the Master of the instance. Includes a sample scene showing some example uses and a prefab for quick drag-&-drop Master instance icon.
Notes: UdonSharp Required, Please credit me if used.

Name: Boby's World Portal System
Author: BobyStar
Description: A portal system that allows players to drop portals and teleport to different locations and players in your world. Including safety features like preventing portals from being dropped onto teleport & spawn locations, players, and steep areas. You can also prevent other players from teleporting to you by disallowing player teleport in the settings. Multiple ways to summon the portal menu including press both triggers, double tap a trigger, and pickup from your shoulder or hips.
Notes: UdonSharp Required, Please credit me if used.

Name: Udon Climbing/Gliding/Swimming System
Author: VoHeLi
Description: A simple prefab to implement climbing, swimming and gliding into your world (Ask me on discord for any question : VoHeLi#5744)

Name: Party Zone Keypad And Auto Login System
Author: labthe3rd
Description: A keypad with 4 roles in a hierarchy. This system includes auto login for usernames and 4 passwords for each role. The fbx was created by me and made with optimization in mind.

Name: Player Joined Sound And Overlay
Author: labthe3rd
Description: Play sound and show overlay for players in the instance, not for the joining player

Name: The Party Zone Video Player
Author: labthe3rd
Description: A video player designed for clubs created by a club! Stream your content to quest and PC with a 2 link video player that has been tested at multiple events. We are compatible with VRCDN!
Notes: Please join the Party Zone to fill out a ticket with any technical issues you may have.

Name: Random Audio Player
Author: Paci Stardust
Description: A prefab to play random audio clips as ambience or by button-press

Name: Boby's Kirby Locomotion
Author: BobyStar
Description: A Locomotion Controller that allows Players to move like in the game "Kirby and The Forgotten Land." You can Float, Flap, and Exhale Air with up to 100 players in Sync! Multiple settings including 'Max Float Height', 'Time Till Tired', SFX, and Particles. SFX included come from the game "Kirby Star Allies.
Notes: UdonSharp Required, Please credit me if used.

Name: NetworkedEventCaller
Author: Miner28_3#3607
Description: Extends VRChat's SendCustomNetworkEvent and allows sending data together with the event. FOR ADVANCED USERS.

Name: Axe Throwing
Author: mahu
Description: Axe Throwing game with multiple game modes, improved VR throwing, and physics simulation
Notes: Two versions - old version compatible with U# 0.20.3 and new version compatible with U# 1.0

Name: USharpVideo Subtitles
Author: jacklul
Description:
This prefab adds support for SRT subtitles to USharpVideo.
It was build mainly for USharpVideo but will work with any other video player supported by VRChat (Unity and AVPro).

Name: SimpleUdonBrush
Author: Marsy
Description:
just a Brush with asmr sounds when brushing. 

both parties have to click the "on and off" button, localized for comfy reasons <3

Name: Udon UwUtils
Author: Reava_
Description: A collection of not-so-niche UdonSharp scripts for specific uses. Rotations, Tag management, Whitelists, TPs and so on.

Name: Golf Game SGB
Author: Spookyghostboo
Description:
Shoot golf balls into rings for points. The players get a certain amount of golf balls to hit. The Player with the most amount of points win.

You can change the limit of golf balls and the amount of points each ring rewards.

Name: Animation Synchronization System
Author: Sayamame
Description: A system for SDK3 with "Animation synchronization function" and "Event firing function". The included "Full" version prefab will synchronize parameters, playing states, and time for all layers in the Animator given by Inspector. This system uses UdonGraph only.

Name: UdonSnake - U# Based Snake Port
Author: Paci Stardust
Description: See booth page

Name: AlphaCRT
Author: Constapatience
Description: Output AVPro screen to a render texture with the use of a alphamask to only display the parts of the video you want.
Notes: This is a modified version of lox9973 Video Render Texture.  The main use-case is if you have a screen with complex geometry you can use a single quad to for AreaLit lighting to accurately emit/reflect your screen while staying optimized.

Name: Body-O-Pillow 300/Body Pillow Machine
Author: Hexson
Description:
The Body-O-Pillow 300 is the First Version of a Machine that creates a bodypillow of the Person within the Frame. Simply Pop the Prefab in the world as it is and your free to go,
Note: Im a credit whore so please :3

Name: Mission Briefing UI Panel
Author: Steve the Mitochondria
Description: This is a drag & drop panel with synced pickups constrained to the screen. The UI is just mesh with box colliders and the map is an image plane, which can be swapped with another PNG map. Uses: for decorative scenery, RP groups, and potentially game dev purposes.

Name: Minigame Helpers
Author: fuopy
Description: A collection of simple objects to help you improvise new minigames on the spot! Set your spawn point with the "Brickpoint" and set up in-world teleporters using the "Doorgate!

Name: Explode Cube
Author: kleinba
Description: A cube that explodes and vibrates the controller every 0.2m moved.

Name: TreeTime-Drawing Stuff Game!
Author: TheKally
Description: A drawing game where four players Pick a random topic in secret and begin to draw it. They each only have 20 seconds before their canvas switches with their neighbors and they must try to finish their drawing without knowing what it is!

Name: Marble Race
Author: Faxmashine & Hughesy
Description: Bet on marbles and make 'em race! Please check the Readme file.

Name: SimpleUdonElevator
Author: Lilithe Lotor
Description: A simple elevator platform compatible with Udon Object Sync which maintains network synchronization while the platform is moving.
Notes:
This is my first one! I want to share my work with everyone! 

https://twitter.com/lilithebowman

Name: Crazy 8 Ball
Author: Dyslex1k & Crazium
Description:
A Magic 8 Ball prefab designed to give a random answer to any question you ask it!
To setup: Just drag the "Crazy 8 Ball Full" prefab anywhere in your scene, and in-game just grab the Crazy 8 Ball, ask it a yes or no question, shake it, and it will give you an answer!
Answers are synced with all players, so everyone will see the same response.
Notes: Note: Requires UdonSharp by Merlin to work.

Name: Translation System
Author: Latiprod
Description: An easy way to translate in 2 languages your Udon worlds. You can translate text (TMP supported), switch texture and objects according to the selected language. Requires Udon Sharp.

Name: Hex Tec. Simple Privat Room System
Author: Hexson
Description: Udon Framework to make easy Privat/lockebel rooms (Meshes can be swapped out with acctuel door meshes without stuff breaking)

Name: RubisBounce
Author: Rubisorange
Description: A bounce pad prefab to use as a trampoline with changeable settings.

Name: VR Comfort Ramp
Author: Joker is punk
Description: Helps with motion sickness by swapping an inclined collider for a flat collider while moving in play space.

Name: Avatar Menu
Author: Steve the Mitochondria
Description:
Original design by VoidCake: A scrolling UI menu that can store several avatars. 

Required before importing:
-VRCSDK3
-Udon Sharp

Name: Stepmania VRC
Author: Jiraymin
Description: This project aims to recreate stepmania (https://github.com/stepmania/stepmania) into vrchat. It basically is a combination of a parser for sm files + visualizers and gameplay manager using the parsed data + virtual arcade pads.

Name: Surface Slide
Author: Pokeyi
Description: Surface sliding object controller for VRChat. Can be used to translate game objects' parent rotations into lateral movement.

Name: Zoned voice dampening
Author: Rubisorange
Description: Allows the creation of zones in which players can hear each other or not. Can make "soundproof" walls/floors. Also includes a player location information board.

Name: Udon Bakery Adapter
Author: z3y
Description: A script that handles Bakery material property blocks used for SH and RNM with Udon

Name: Udon Worldle - U#-Based Wordle Port
Author: Paci Stardust
Description: See booth page

Name: VRChat Exploding Egg Udon!!
Author: TWKTemplar
Description: An udon sharp egg that will blow up in your face if you get too close! Sends the player flying and throws around a decent amount of temp particles

Name: SimpleUdonMirror
Author: Marsy
Description: A simple Udon Mirror with different Quality options:  High, Medium, Low

Name: Ok drawing prefab
Author: Kenoli
Description:
An art tool with many features for painting and photo editing.

Configurable brushes, color blending, resizable canvas, layers, image sync, owner lock.

Name: CyanPlayerObjectPool
Author: CyanLaser
Description: A VRChat system that will assign a unique object to every player in the world. Requires UdonSharp to work, but player objects can use any Udon compiler. Package includes examples in UdonGraph, UdonSharp, and CyanTrigger.

Name: Udon Minesweeper - U# Based Minesweeper Port
Author: Paci Stardust
Description: See booth page

Name: Video Avatar Lighting
Author: _pi_
Description: Lights up player avatars based on video input. Does not require custom shaders, so it should work on most avatars.

Name: Timezone Sync Hologram
Author: Vistanz
Description: This is a hologram earth can shows everyone's timezones, approximate location based on the timezone and their local time in the same world instance.

Name: Player Count Toggle
Author: Realmlist
Description: Player Count Toggle

Name: Never Have I Ever with Microphone and Scoreboard
Author: Fionna
Description:
This prefab is a drag and drop Never Have I Ever game.

It comes with a microphone, automatic scoreboard, and light-up floor panels. The microphone start panel can be customized with question suggestions.

Name: Collision Audio with CyanTrigger
Author: Fionna
Description:
This prefab shows you how to use CyanTrigger to create realistic audio effects based on the collision speed of objects in a VRChat SDK3 world. There are two versions, one that changes the pitch based on velocity, and one that allows you to select from a list of audio clips.

There is also a "semi-synced" example that fixes some issues with Object Sync, by enabling a non-synced physics version when an object is released.

Name: Beer Pong with CyanTrigger
Author: Fionna
Description:
This prefab is a Beer Pong game for a VRChat world, using CyanTrigger. This prefab is drag and drop, but you can also customize the appearance if you desire.

This prefab is built to official beer pong competition dimensions!

Name: Sticky Surface
Author: Juice...
Description: A demo scene where a variety of pickups stick to targets using a script that detects collision to switch kinematic on and off.

Name: Udon2048 - U#-Based 2048 Port
Author: Paci Stardust
Description: *Please read booth link for full info*

Name: Wander AI
Author: KevBal
Description: Wander AI with Animation support! Check script summary for details! Requires U#
Notes: Ideal with the RPG Quest System

Name: Udon Starter Kit
Author: akalink
Description: A collection of starter scripts, shaders, and editor scripts to beginner developers.

Name: Raycast Laser
Author: Pokeyi
Description: Raycast laser renderer and point-plotter for VRChat. Raycast a visual line-rendered laser with optional reflective properties and point-plotting for collision-detection objects.

Name: Player Tracking
Author: Pokeyi
Description: Local player body-part tracking for VRChat. Track specific player avatar body parts and bones as well as smoothly attach game objects to those positions.

Author: Pokeyi

Name: Animation Sync

Name: Haptics Profile
Author: Pokeyi
Description: Controller haptics profile for VRChat. Custom-tailor controller vibration presets to be placed in your scene with additional options for distance-based culling and amplitude-falloff.

Name: Floater Sync

Description: UTC-synced bobbing and rocking motion for floating objects in VRChat. Manage synced bobbing and rocking motions for multiple floating game objects simultaneously synchronized to all players without networking.

Name: Omni-Action

Description: Multi-purpose user-action/event and function-handling component for VRChat. Can be used for a growing multitude of VRChat world interactions and game-logic functions.

Name: Udon Record player

Name: UdonMotion

Name: Voice Dampening

Allows you to override people's avatar sound settings. Very handy for regularly crowded worlds such as VR clubs.

Name: Deck of Cards
Author: Vowgan

Name: NUSaveState
Author: Nestorboy
Description: NUSaveState is a prefab which allows world creators to save and load Udon data with the use of avatars. The scripts are built with both Udon Graph and Udon Sharp users in mind, and the system is also Quest compatible.

Name: Thry's Beer Pong
Author: Thryrallo
Description: Beer Pong with better ball and cup sync, different modes, multiple players and more

Name: FaxFallDamage

If players hit the ground too hard they go oof and die.
Is using the combat system, which is deprecated. Use at your own Risk.

Name: Interactable Objects
Author: Karet

Name: Udon Airtime

Name: UI Options Panel prefab: Post-Processing, Music, Toggles using CyanTrigger
Author: Fionna
Description:
This prefab allows you to control various options in your VRChat SDK3 world. You can control Post-Processing effects like Bloom and Brightness, Audio volume, and toggle various objects and effects, all using CyanTrigger.
The YouTube video is a tutorial explaining how to build and use this system.

- IF/ELSE statements
- Using variables between different objects

Notes: I offer free tech support for all my assets. Hit me up on my discord with any questions! https://discord.gg/7hdZsFtyxP

Name: UdonPlatformHook

Behavior can be enabled or disabled based on layers.

Author: Joker is punk

A combat system that features multi segment hitboxes that track: head, torso and legs

Some prefabricated guns are included.

guns are currently raycast only and come with variable damage, there is 2 example guns provided for reference

This is a fork I made of a the day night cycle used in the autumn themed world. I used my own implementation in my world Serene Seaside, which is on the World Jam: Drawing row: https://vrchat.com/home/launch?worldId=wrld_8b709af3-4e49-4dec-9cbb-132b2234fe7f

Name: Daily Japanese

Description:
Learning Japanese Daily in Home World"

A UI panel(s) that shows different Japanese daily content based on the provided local database attached!

This prefab database includes all of Hiragana/Katakana, and also all "Kanji, Vocabulary, and Grammar" content from the universal JLPT tests.
Every time the world is loaded, random elements from the database is called and displayed on the UI(s) just like random flashcards.

The prefab can switch and toggle between: Hiragana, Katakana, Kanji (All N levels), Grammar (All N levels), and Vocabulary (All N levels)

Name: ToggUltima
Author: DrakenStark
Description:
An UdonSharp toggle script with optional components built to minimize world development workload and also provide a wide variety of functionality. Give your interactive objects an Action script and fly from there!

- Toggle multiple objects at once with a single interactive object in a variety of ways. Decorate your mirror walls and temporarily disable the decorations while the mirror is enabled.
- List all your mirrors or other objects in one script and have them automatically disabled when not in use! No need to manage the same list multiple times across all your interactive objects to protect everyone's framerates.
- Sync your toggles together with ease (Drag toggle scripts into an array and done!) and with minimal network traffic (One variable is used to sync together all the toggle scripts you put in it!).
- Reserve your interactive objects with a bouncer script that allows you to have a list of who you want and don't want to be able to use them.
- Feel free to use multiple sets of these scripts for any number of separate systems within your worlds! One sync script can still be used for all of them if desired!

Please feel free to get a hold of me Twitter and Telegram @DrakenStark or Discord @Draken Stark#2888 with any feedback or questions.
Notes: Rebuilt from the ground up from my previous script OnlyOneGroupToggle. Just use the ToggUltima Action script if it's all you needed and wish to update to this latest version.

Name: Conversation System
Author: MMMaellon
Description: Converts fountain scripts (film script not code script) into Udon Behaviours that can type out the lines in a dialog box like a classic RPG game. Lines are assigned to the speaker speaking them, and if the player controls that speaker they get to choose dialog options. There are controls for making certain dialog paths conditional and for triggering sounds and animations and changing the timings of everything and all that. There's also an untested feature that lets you interrupt a conversation with a second conversation, and then go back to that first conversation after the interruption. Conversations are synced but be warned this system generates an Udon Behaviour for every line that's spoken and makes the world take longer to load when you get a couple hundred lines.
Notes: I got a world with an old version of this system, but it should show off the basics. Codebase is here: https://gitlab.com/MMMaellon/vr-conversations/

Name: Entorix Collision Trigger
Author: Entorix
Description: A basic particle death stop-action/avatar dynamics based collision detector that allows the triggering of animations when the gameobject collides with a generic collider

Name: Full body sitting layer
Author: Dannyboi
Description: A sitting layer for 3.0 avatars that lets you keep full body while in a station, and reverts to normal sitting when in half-body or desktop

Name: Friendship Bracelet
Author: Liindy
Description: Need a fancy way to show people who you really love the most? The Friendship Bracelet will do exactly that! With contact sender and receiver, you can make your bracelet react to your significant other, close friend or anyone who has set the same ID to their bracelet. Anyone who has the bracelet, but not the same ID on it will not react together.

Name: HOITEX Trombone
Author: Hoizen
Description: A functional Trombone using VRC Native Avatar Dynamics

Name: WorldSync
Author: Juzo
Description: A prefab to help keep your world drops Synchronized for late joiners.

Name: VRC Headpat Counter
Author: TimeLincoln
Description: A dynamic counter for VRChat. This script uses parameters setup inside VRC Contact Receivers. It will track and temporarily display set properties into VRC's chatbox each time one of those properties is incremented.

Name: OSCLeash
Author: ZenithVal
Description: A simple OSC tool to move the player in the direction of and stretchable physbone. You could pull someone with you by holding their hand or yanking their tail!

Name: Expanded Avatar Hand Interactions (EAHI)
Author: Faycal#6941
Description: Allows your hands to interact with other people's body parts in the form of visual special effects, sound effects, haptics, along with interacting with your own body as well. Multiple SFX, VFX, toggles are included. Project is under MIT license.

Name: Portable Mirror Drop (PMD)
Author: Juzo_VR
Description: A prefab that allows a user to drop a local 2d "mirror" that is easily adjusted to the users needs.
Notes: This prefab uses Phys bones and radial menu options.

Name: Eye Tracking to Animation
Author: akalink
Description: This prefab reduces the amount of boilerplate work required to make custom eye tracking. It takes eye movement and converts it into animation float data.

Name: Portal Gun for Avatars
Author: Fooma
Description: Avatar Portal Gun system using raycasts, stations, and constraints.
Notes:
Installation Video: https://youtu.be/CXBibi_BLcM 
Portals can only be used by others, current VRC limitation of not being able to using your own portals.

Name: Hop Follower + Super Ultra Combat Critters
Author: MMMaellon
Description: A set of prefabs that adds a critter to your avatar that follows you by hopping around. If you install the full Super Ultra Combat Critters version, your avatar can fight other people's critters to earn badges with a turn-based combat system.

Name: Worldlock AutoSetup
Author: Voyage
Description: A small Unity tool to setup World Locked objects on avatars

Name: AvatarJukebox
Author: Nichevo
Description: A toggleable worldspace jukebox for your avatar which anyone can interact with. Once set up, just drop your in your favorite audio tracks. Requires Poiyomi shader. Instructions in readme file.

Name: WakaKeyboard
Author: Wakamu
Description: A Quest and PC compatible typing keyboard for avatars
Notes: A script is included for automatic installation

Name: OSCMotion
Author: lox9973
Description: A tool to stream avatar motion from Unity to VRChat by sending muscle values over OSC

Name: Grabbable Balloon!
Author: G1fan
Description: Pop! A grabbable balloon you can put on your avatar and share with your friends! Pop!

Name: IK 2.0 11 Point Armature
Author: Alease
Description: a .blend for those who are looking for an example of 11 point tracking armature. Armature will also degrade gracefully with 6 and 9 point tracking.

Name: Player Tracker
Author: hfcRed
Description: A system which allows you to select and attach a tracker to any standard avatar contact on any player.

Name: Among Us Follower
Author: hfcRed
Description: A very simple, one step set up, self contained crewmate follower.

Name: Avatar Remote
Author: bd_
Description: Uses Avatar Dynamics to transmit Av3.0 parameters between two avatars

Name: PhysBone Salvage Converter
Author: Hearty Laboratory
Description: Convert DyanmicBone based Avatar into PhysBone without having DynamicBone asset.

Name: Yash's Avatar Dynamics VRC Keyboard
Author: Yash
Description: A Shader/Animator keyboard prefab for avatars using avatar dynamics!

Name: Yash's Upset Prefab
Author: Yash
Description: Upset Game using Avatar Dynamics

Name: Yash's Stations & Portals Prefab
Author: Yash
Description: Stations & Portals Game using Avatar Dynamics

Name: Yash's Pretzel Prefab
Author: Yash
Description: Pretzel Game using Avatar Dynamics

Name: Yash's Nuisance Prefab
Author: Yash
Description: Nuisance Game using Avatar Dynamics

Name: Yash's Assume Who Prefab
Author: Yash
Description: Assume Who Game Using Avatar Dynamics

Name: Yash's Bridge4 Prefab
Author: Yash
Description: Bridge4 Game using Avatar Dynamics

Name: Yash's Bingo Prefab
Author: Yash
Description: Bingo using Avatar Dyanamics!

Name: YASH?S AD CHESS PREFAB
Author: Yash
Description: Chess using Avatar Dynamics!

Name: Functional  Bass and Piano
Author: TheKally
Description: Working musical instruments Using the New VRChat physbones

Name: Twitch to VRChat OSC Interactions
Author: Fooma and Killers0992
Description:
Twitch to VRChat Interaction, using OSC.
Let your chat throw objects at your avatar, move you around, or run any animation on your avatar.  Automatically detect subscription events, bits, redeemptions, follows, and any other Twitch event. Demo props, OSC Bot, animations, and sounds included.
Notes:
Video Installation:
Part 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mVc0jofi9tk

Part 2: https://youtu.be/Clxx1XewFVs

Customize Props: https://youtu.be/8WWHqbNT49k

Name: Eyes Kit
Author: Mothblocks and Peptron1
Description: Editor script used for setting up a set of cameras and animations to allow an avatar to "see through their hands
Notes: It's fairly disorienting to see out of your avatar's eyes, there is a demo avatar (along with other prefabs) in this world if you would like to try it out: https://vrchat.com/home/launch?worldId=wrld_38a1c724-b95b-4d84-b538-4007a29d6352

Name: Expressions Menu Hierarchy Editor
Author: HaÃ¯~
Description:
Edit your avatar menus as if they were objects in your scene hierarchy.

If your menu has parameters that are missing from your VRCExpressionParameters asset, you can still upload your avatar. It will generate disabled icons that do nothing.

Name: WorldObject
Author: Oli__
Description: vrc-worldobject allows you to create world space props that are network-synced for late joiners.
Notes: Prerequisites: (1) 19 bits of available parameter space (2 floats and 3 bools) (2) TouchOSC (3) A custom Fx layer and expression parameters already configured (even if they're empty) (4) a free material slot

Name: Gun Constraint
Author: The_Impiersonator
Description: A prefab that allows the usage of both hands to aim a gun and move it around you avatar's body while only using a single 3D model, with only 2 constraints.
Notes: This prefab can be easily setup to use either the radial menu or gestures.

Name: Constraint Pet
Author: Scionzenos
Description: Have a pet on your avatar that crawls from bone to bone, following where those bones in real time! Best for things like spiders or other animals that cling onto stuff easily.
Notes: This prefab is mainly for learning how it works, I recommend using Lyuma's AV3 Emulator to see how things are working in real time: https://github.com/lyuma/Av3Emulator

Name: Idioma (Avatar)
Author: Flower Of Good
Description: A free to use avatar using stencils for the face.

Name: MuteMarker
Author: kittyn
Description: Particle-based marker that lets you pick up and set down the canvas - with 1-click installer

Name: VRC Gesture manager
Author: BlackStartx
Description: A tool that will help you preview and edit your avatar animation directly in Unity.  Available for both VRChat SDK 2.0 and SDK 3.0, in Unity 2018 or 2019.

Name: Animated Toggles
Author: Scionzenos
Description: Three different ways to toggle between two states with a transition in-between them, instead of instantly going from one state to the other. The float based method allows starting and stopping at any point during the transition.
Notes: Lyuma's Avatar 3.0 Emulator is required for part of this prefab to work in the editor.

Name: Throwable boomerang
Author: Ivylistar
Description: Simple constraints based throwable boomerang.

Name: Unity 2018 to 2019 Cloth Transfer
Author: HaÃ¯~
Description:
Cloth Transfer is a Unity Editor tool that lets you transfer cloth constraints of a mesh from a Unity 2018 project into a Unity 2019 project.

It was created mainly to assist migration from Unity 2018 to Unity 2019 in the VRChat social platform.

Name: ExpressionsEditor
Author: HaÃ¯~
Description:
ExpressionsEditor an animation editor that lets you create face expressions with the help of previews.

It generates a preview of all blendshapes of an avatar, highlighting the area that is being modified by the blendshape. They can then be inserted into an animation with one click.

In its standalone form, it does not require any SDK of any platform to be installed.
Notes: To install its standalone form, you can uncheck the "ComboGesture" folder after opening the .unitypackage file.

Name: Yash's VRC Keyboard 3.0
Author: Yash
Description: A VRC Keyboard with a 2axis- Puppet Control Selection menu.  Can be used on both Desktop or VR.
Notes: Control Keyboard with one hand and use Fist+Trigger in the Opposite hand. Desktop can use L/R Shift+F2 then to another Gesture to stop the selection.

Name: Pumkin's avatar tools
Author: Pumkin
Description: An editor script that adds tools to help you setup avatars faster and easier. It includes a component copier that makes it a lot easier to reimport your avatars, and tools to make your thumbnails nicer.

Name: Yash's Otamatone Prefab
Author: Yash
Description: A Playable Otamatone Using Avatar 3.0 (VR ONLY)
Notes: Uses Right Trigger Weight For Volume along side the Fist Gesture and a Radial menu for Note Control!

Name: GoGo Loco
Author: Franada
Description: Full control over the locomotion movements animation in game with toggle. 3 PT/desktop can sit anywhere they want with various position. Build in PlaySpace feature.
Notes: Sub menu and toggle are block if requirement are not met. As example, sitting emotes if the user is not in a station.

Name: Walking Flowerpot (Generic Rigged model)
Author: Flower Of Good
Description: An AV3 avatar with a Generic rig fully setup with emotes and the like!

Name: Nos Animator
Author: Nosjo
Description: Basicaly an animator to attempt to restore most fbt behavior to sdk2 while still working for non fbt users
Notes:
Disable 6 point locomotion as descriped in the readme
Also disables jump/fall by default, and also has option to disable walking animations with a toggle in expression menu

Name: Yash's Desktop Keyboard
Author: Yash
Description: A Keyboard you can type with in desktop using the AV3 menu.

Name: Emoji System
Author: Ponponsan
Description: Custom emoji system where you can have your own original emojis with animations. This is vol 1&2, which is a VketChan plus+ Pack and a Mokuri Pack

Name: VketChan plus+
Author: Ponponsan
Description: Custom modified VketChan packed with Avatars 3.0 content fit for beginner's researching the 3.0 system

Name: Basic Turret Set-up
Author: Chen
Description: A simple set up that can make the turret rotate and adjust via 2-axis puppet.

Name: Avatar 3.0 Emulator
Author: Lyuma
Description: In-editor emulation of VRChat's Avatar 3.0 PlayableGraph in the editor

Name: Inventory system generator for Avatar 3.0
Author: Merlin
Description: Script for generating inventories in Avatar 3.0

Name: ComboGestureExpressions for Avatars 3.0
Author: HaÃ¯~
Description: ComboGestureExpressions is an Unity Editor tool that lets you attach face expressions to hand gestures, and automatically generate an Avatars 3.0 animator to match these gestures.

Name: Lit Armband Shader
Author: 4liceD
Description:
Animated armband shader that it designed to show off your name or logos. The texture input supports RGB and cutout. Comes in 3 varations. 
-Simple rotating shader with no dependencies needed 
-Audiolink shader that needs vcc audiolink imported to get a waveform and animated borders in audiolink compatible worlds
-LTCGI that has everything of the audiolink version plus ltcgi realtime lighting in compatible worlds and needs the vpm version of audiolink imported into your project. https://vpm.pimaker.at/

Name: Audio Ink
Author: ArchiTechAnon
Description:
Audio Ink was a shader originally designed for the Vibe Inc world (https://vrchat.com/home/world/wrld_a5e12310-5459-4a59-ab06-a731f735d298)
This is a shader that is build with Line/Trail Renderers in mind, but can be used anywhere.
It pulses the UV with a color shift across the horizontal UV axis.
Supports multiple shaping options.
MIT License.
Created with Amplify Shader Editor, so you can use that to modify or improve the shader if you want.
Notes: Vertex Color mode only works for Line and Trail Renderers (that I know of)

Name: Taken
Author: YIMIR
Description: Destiny 2 Taken Shader Remake

Name: UniTAE
Author: lox9973
Description: TAESD (Tiny AutoEncoder for Stable Diffusion) ported to Unity pixel shader. It can be used as a neural texture decompressor in VRC.

Name: Avatar VideoScreen
Author: 4liceD
Description:
Simple shader that uses the global property "_Udon_VideoTex" to show the worlds video screen on avatars.
Shader has a fallback texture slot for unsupported worlds.
Works with ProTV 3.0, comes with udon prefab to make your custom render texture global.

Name: Poiyomi Toon Shader
Author: poiyomi
Description: A feature rich toon shader for unity and VRChat.

Name: Phantom Star for CineShader
Author: YIMIR
Description:
This shader is converted from Shadertoy to make it usable in Unity. 
Original: https://www.shadertoy.com/view/ttKGDt

Name: ShaderGraph (Modified for Unity 2022 & VRChat)
Author: z3y
Description: Modified ShaderGraph Built-in pipeline target for Unity 2022 for VRChat (Forward Rendering only).

Name: Glasses Lens Shader
Author: AliceD
Description: Shader made for glasses, offers gradient colored reflections, smudge system, optional ltcgi support and optional mic status/xsoverlay indicators

Name: Hash Studios Water Shader
Author: Hash Studios LLC
Description:
A free water shader for the default render pipeline!

The shader provides customizable properties for waving, movement, and distortion, making it versatile for various water effects.

Learn more at... 
hashstudiosllc.com/hashstudioswatershader

Name: Audiolink Glitch Shader
Author: 4liceD
Description: Animates your Texture or RenderTexture with glitch and strobe effects controlled by audiolink.

Name: Graphlit
Author: z3y
Description: A node shader editor for Toon and PBR shaders

Name: Memory Dream Rail
Author: Shadowriver
Description: Geometry shader that changes mesh in to rail of looping photos from multiple spread sheets, supports stereoscopic 3D images as well as flip book animations. Have different positioning configurations and fade effects. Good for photo gallery, but also with manual progression parameter it can controlled from external sources, like Udon or Avatars 3.0, for example for UI purposes.

Name: Retro Sprite Shader V2
Author: error.mdl
Description: Simple shader that emulates the behavior of directional sprites from many mid-90's pseudo-3d games (Wolfenstein, Doom, Hexen, Duke Nukem, Daggerfall, Marathon, etc.)

Name: Party FX - AudioLink Shader
Author: tsuna moo
Description:
This is the shader that drives all my AudioLink effects.

It has options for a variety of things.
- PBR
- Emission Effects
- Rimlight
- Noise Distort
- Multiband AudioLink Effects
- AudioLink Shake Effects
- Audio Bars
- Audio Graphs

Name: Simple Glass - Glass Shader
Author: tsuna moo
Description:
This is my glass shader. It is inspired by GTA.
It is fairly simple but has a secret.
It is more opaque at around 90 degree angles as well as more reflective.
This makes glass more visible and gives it a better look without looking less like glass.

It also has options for a faint glow.

Name: Crystal Water - Flowing Water Shader
Author: tsuna moo
Description:
This shader is a performant water shader that supports flowmaps.
(It does not use Depth or ScreenSpace)

It is best used indoor as well as fountains and smaller water objects. (It is not a good choice for oceans)

Name: Japanese Handwriting Classification
Author: SCRN
Description: Japanese handwriting classification using a new and compact convolution model converted into fragment shaders to be used inside VRChat or Unity.

Name: Lit Shader
Author: z3y
Description: A Standard shader replacement for VRChat Worlds with lots of features.

Name: Language Translation with Fragment Shaders
Author: SCRN
Description: An English to Japanese translator made for VRChat in fragment shaders

Name: Simple Water FX
Author: tsuna moo
Description: A unlit frag water shader optimized for quest and performance.

Name: Amplify Editable Mirror Shader
Author: tsuna moo
Description: The vrchat mirror shader but editable in amplify.

Name: Flux Shader
Author: Rollthered
Description: Flux is a screen space shader for avatars designed to mitigate bloom in worlds for people with sensitive eyes!

Name: Instant Latex Shader
Author: Rollthered
Description: This is a drag and drop latex shader that uses offset vectors and fresnel for minimal file size. No textures, all math!

Name: Fire Lite
Author: Rollthered
Description: Fire Lite is a shader that uses a displaced outline pass to simulate a flame effect! Worlds powered by Audio Link will also dynamically effect this shader to react to music.

Name: Virus LQP-79
Author: fuopy
Description: Action-adventure game. Save your neighbors from a zombie outbreak in this shader port of TEAM a.r.g's Arduboy classic, Virus LQP-79!

Name: Manga Shader
Author: _pi_
Description: A manga-style realtime shadow shader. Most useful for flooring and walls.

Name: Low-poly-style procedural night skybox
Author: _pi_
Description: Simple procedural night skybox. Optimized, and comes with a script to capture into a static asset for Quest.

Name: Aurora (w/ AudioLink)
Author: _pi_
Description: Raymarched aurora shader, highly optimized and reacts to AudioLink.

Name: 3D Face Landmark Detection
Author: SCRN
Description: Converts a RGB camera input of a face into 3D points (landmarks) on a face mesh with iris tracking. Both face and iris neural network models implemented with shaders using CRTs.

Name: VR Stage Lighting
Author: AcChosen
Description: A collection of HLSL shaders, UdonSharp scripts, 3D models, prefabs, and assets designed to emulate the real control, quality, and complexity of professional stage lighting into VRChat in as many ways as possible.

Name: orels1 AudioLink Shader
Author: orels1
Description: A simple shader that adds AudioLink effects to avatars

Name: YOLOv4-tiny Object Detector in a Shader
Author: SCRN
Description: A modern object detector inside fragment shaders for VRChat

Name: MUI Shader
Author: Merlin
Description: Modification of the Unity builtin UI shader that fixes the edges of quads being visible on text characters

Name: ShaderMotion
Author: lox9973
Description: A shader-based humanoid motion codec and avatar animator

Name: QuestVRCPano
Author: Lhun
Description: VRCPano, but working on quest with render textures. I can't take full credit for this but I applied a fix generally based on other MIT/CC0 sources in 360VR video circles
Notes: Use in place of VRCPano's shader

Name: Voice Recognition Shader
Author: SCRN
Description: Audio detection with visemes controlling a robot doggo done with shaders.

Name: Sunshine Flare
Author: Silent
Description: A shader that renders a lens flare and crepuscular rays (sun rays) from the sun over the scene, for Unity/VRchat.

Name: VRC  Mirror Inside Area
Author: Silent
Description: A shader that renders the area's reflection probe on the inside, which is only visible through a mirror. This is useful for creating a low-quality proxy background of a space for the mirror reflection.

Name: orels1 Unity Shaders
Author: orels1
Description: A collection of variety unity shaders, currently containing a fancy wave effect and an Ice parallax-based shader. To be expanded with more shaders as I have time

Name: VRCPlayersOnlyMirror
Author: Temporal
Description: A simple shader gimmick to have mirrors reflect players only without any background with some minor caveats. Comes with basic prefabs for sdk2 and sdk3 with simple slider for adjusting the mirror transparency.

Name: Pix2Pix in a Fragment Shader
Author: SCRN
Description: An image to image deep learning network that outputs images based on random inputs.

Name: StereoCancer
Author: xwidghet
Description: An open-source stereo-correct screen-space shader for Unity, mainly intended for usage in animations and games such as VRChat

Name: Cancerspace
Author: Red_Mage
Description: A screenspace shader made for VRChat with a heavy focus on configurability and specifically made for, but not limited to, use with animations

Name: AKStandard / AKUnlit
Author: AoiKamishiro
Description:
Modifications StandardShader and UnlitShader.
The Standaerd shader has support for roughness maps and can switch between culling modes.
The Unlit shader supports both texture and color inputs and can switch between Opaque and Transparent without changing the shader.

Name: SimpNet Deep Learning in a Shader
Author: SCRN
Description: A trainable convolutional neural network inside a fragment shader

Name: ShaderIK
Author: lox9973
Description: Custom fullbody IK done in shader

Name: UV Sky
Author: Synergiance
Description: 360ï¿½ video skybox shader.  Use the slider to change the orientation.

Name: Synergiance Toon Shader
Author: Synergiance
Description: A general purpose toon shader specialized for MMD style shading

Name: Chess Shader With Artificial Intelligence
Author: SCRN
Description: A simple AI implemented using the classic minimax algorithm except it's on a GPU.

Name: Handholding Shader IK
Author: HaÃ¯~
Description:
This shader allows two avatars to be holding hands, mainly designed for dancing.

A very simplistic IK system is reprogrammed within the shader code to control a fake arm of one avatar, which will be attracted towards a special light of another avatar.

As it is a shader, the effect is not affected by lag: It will give the appearance of handholding from the perspective of everyone with shaders and particles enabled, no matter the delay between the two dancers.

Name: Quest Reflecting Water Ripple Shader
Description: Extremely performant Quest water shader that reflects the skybox or surroundings and has animated water ripples, written for the Bamboo Temple world, looks great on PC too
Notes: Open the link and save as 'QuestReflectWater.shader' and drop into your assets, use the skybox cubemap (or a well placed reflection probe) and a normal map of water ripples for best results

Name: KungFu Chat
Author: SCRN
Description: Arcade game written entirely in Unity CG

Name: Shader Based Fireworks
Author: RED_SIM
Description: Shader based fireworks, which you can control from a video stream!
Notes: See the README file in the asset folder!

Name: Perfect Water Shaders by RED_SIM
Author: RED_SIM
Description: A water shader with almost no visual refraction artifacts and glitches. Supports: Two normal map layers, Ripples and flow animation, Depth fog, Refraction, Lots of color settings, Depth color desaturation, Almost no visual refraction artifacts. Full version also gives you: Underwater fog without post processing, Physically correct underwater surface.

Name: noriben Quest Water Shader
Author: noriben
Description: Lite Water Shader for Quest and PC.

Name: PixelFont
Author: lox9973
Description: Pixelated font shader for 3D Text Mesh, to be used in front of opaque objects
Notes: Renders before transparent queue, so not intended for transparent UI panels as written.

Name: Dual Cubemap Skybox
Author: Lyuma
Description: Skybox picks one of two cubemaps based on the light direction

Name: Raymarched Reflections (android/pc)
Author: Rhomboid.com
Description: This is a GLSL shader I converted to HLSL and debugged for unity made by "Shane
Notes: apply material to a surface, even a skybox. Try an inverted sphere or box.

Name: MerlinUI
Author: Merlin
Description: Modification of the Unity builtin UI shader that fixes the edges of quads being visible on text characters

Name: Red's Thousand Mirrors Shader
Author: Rollthered < Pretty cool guy
Description: As seen in "Two Thousand Mirrors

Name: Raymarched GPU Particles with Screenspace Physics
Author: SCRN
Description: GPU particles raymarched to look like slime blobs that collides with depth.

Name: Face and Object Detection for VRChat
Author: SCRN
Description: A binary classifier implemented with a support vector machine (SVM) used to detected faces or other objects.

Name: Time Shaders
Author: y23586
Description: Displays time based on timezone.

Name: XSToon
Author: Xiexe
Description: Xiexes Unity Shaders

Name: 3D Video Shaders
Author: TCL
Description: Shaders for using Side-By-Side and Over-Under video in VRChat.

Name: Dafirex's Particle Shader
Author: Dafirex
Description: Particle Shader that uses noise textures to make particle textures

Name: SilVR Water V2.0
Author: Sil
Description: Water shader with wave effect on collide and reflection using mirror & skybox

Name: PencilSketchEffect
Author: khalladay
Description: Real Time Hatching In Unity

Name: Standard Subsurface Scattering
Author: Silent
Description: All the features of the Standard with approximated Subsurface Scattering. Perfect for characters and objects made of thin cloth!

Name: Silent's Cel Shading Shader
Author: Silent
Description: A cel shading shader for VRchat with proper lighting and lots and lots of features!

Name: NoeNoe Shaders
Author: NoeNoe
Description: Avatar and Overlay Shaders

Name: Fishy
Author: _pi_
Description: Raymarched fish for your avatar or world. Sometimes they drift to AudioLink. Exhibit at ShaderFes 2021.

Name: LTCGI
Author: _pi_
Description: Optimized plug-and-play realtime area lighting using the linearly transformed cosine algorithm. Makes video players emit light onto surroundings.

Name: Simple Counter Shader (VRChat OSC Ready)
Author: RED_SIM
Description: Basically displays an Integer value using a single material. Uses SDF technology to be perfectly crisp in both VR and Desktop.

Name: Demkeys Color Grid
Author: Demkeys
Description: A color grid implemented in a fragment shader, that executes instructions to perform various grid operations.

Name: Rainy Glass Shader
Author: Toadstorm
Description: A customizable shader for creating rain-on-glass effects. PC and Quest compatible.

Name: Shader Graph Importer
Author: z3y
Description: A way to import built-in Shader Graph shaders and use them in VRChat with additional features

Name: Geometry Dissolve
Author: Vilar
Description: Easy to use shader that allows you to have a cool geometrical dissolve effect. Uses case examples being like for when you go AFK.

Name: StencilExamples
Author: wata_pj
Description: Examples used to only reveal objects when viewed through a transparent frame or lens, using shader stencils.

Name: PZ Video Shader
Author: labthe3rd
Description: A video player shader for vrchat that has controls for special effects.

Name: Raymarching with the ShadowCaster
Author: SCRN
Description: An example of using depth with raymarching to interact with standard mesh objects in Unity. Also uses a trick of sampling it's own depth in other shader passes to avoid marching multiple times.

Name: Point Pillars in UnityCG
Author: SCRN
Description: 3D object detection (cars, people, cyclists) with machine learning inside VRChat using a point cloud as input. It's similar to systems used in self driving cars, although my implementation is a bit slow.

Name: ToonLinkWaterShader
Author: MMMaellon
Description: Looks like water in Toon Link

Name: Fionna's Creepy Shader
Author: Fionna
Description: A set of creepy blob shaders and example materials for animated blobs, eggs, eyeballs

Name: Camera Blocker
Author: orels1
Description: A simple prefab that allows you to make areas where player handheld/drone cameras get filled with pure black so they can't see what they aren't supposed to

Name: Trixies' Interior Mapping
Author: Trixelized
Description: A very basic parallax interior mapping shader, designed for Quest worlds. Makes it look like there's actually rooms behind a building's windows.

Name: FPSGraphShader
Author: ZekkVRC
Description: A graph of local FPS

Name: PixelShader MotionTracking LedEffect
Author: Dieu / 1001 / Luftprut
Description: Track your character on a wall using a led pixel effect ! Perfect for stages.
Notes: This work is in progress and may have a V2 in some day

Name: Pixel texture shader
Description: Makes textures look pixellated, options for grid and edge colors
Notes: useful for camera quads and 8bit effects

Name: VRChat Mirror Reflection Shader
Author: VRChat
Description: Drop this in your world so the mirror reflection works in unity, they 'forgot' to put it in the SDK
Notes: Adds the hidden missing shader for mirrors to any world project, just drop in assets

Name: Liquid drink shader
Author: MinionsArt
Description: Liquid shader used to act like the object has liquid in it. Can be used for drinks.

Name: Silent's Clear Water Shader
Author: Silent
Description: A (not too) simple and clean water shader for Unity that focuses on looking nice with nice performance. Uses the scene reflection probes for reflections and depth buffer access for a smooth transition between the edge, foam, water surface and depths.
Notes: Like all other water shaders with depth-based effects, requires depth buffer for depth effects, so your scene will need a shadow-casting directional light. You can set it to only affect the UIMenu layer to save performance/your world is using only baked lighting.

Name: Lava Lamp
Author: Luftprut
Description: Simple ray-tracing shader and example prefab of spherical lava lamp

Name: SilVR Water Shader v1.1
Author: Blake447
Description: Interactive Water Shader

Name: Water Reflections
Author: Gallium
Description: Caustic water reflections. Two materials, two shaders. One for projectors onto existing materials, one that's kinda like the standard shader but with the effect in the emission slot.

Name: WACOTV Shader
Author: WACOMalt
Description: This shader was made from the ground up to simulate everything that makes old TVs feel the way they do. You get the individual Phosphor Pixel grid, you get the horizontal and vertical abberation and distrotions. You get wipes of noise moving down the screen, scanline animations, etc. This was made specifically to work with VRChat's VRCVideoSync script, so you can point that to your mesh that has this shader, and tell it to override "_MainTex".  It displays a NTSC Color bar test pattern when not overridden.

Name: WACOWater
Author: WACOMalt
Description: This shader was made from the ground up to simulate everything that makes old TVs feel the way they do. You get the individual Phosphor Pixel grid, you get the horizontal and vertical abberation and distrotions. You get wipes of noise moving down the screen, scanline animations, etc. This was made specifically to work with VRChat's VRCVideoSync script, so you can point that to your mesh that has this shader, and tell it to override "_MainTex".  It displays a NTSC Color bar test pattern when not overridden.  In need of a Single-Pass Stereo, VR Compatible water shader?  Maybe mine will help! It's got refraction, supports Reflection probes, or overriding with your own reflection cubemap. Control of fresnel exponent for reflections, and lots of controls for the ripple texture animations. Update: Also now supports LatLong reflection maps (including from render textures!)

Name: Moving Tree and Grass Shaders
Description: Modified diffuse transparent, self illuminating transparent and soft occlusion leaves shaders, just like the unity nature terrain shaders but they wave the grass/trees without having to use terrain!
Notes: No preview available. No prefab, just drop shaders into your project, they will be under transparent/cutout and nature

Name: VRChat Beginner World Creation 101
Author: Lloydish
Description: This 2023 tutorial covers everything from getting VCC to the absolute basics of unity to creating your own vrchat world complete with mirror, teleports, text and more! Learn how to do it all for FREE as long as you have the patience and processing power

Name: VRC School
Author: Jellejurre, JustSleightly

Name: How to upload a VRChat Avatar in 12/2022 and 2023 (Creator Companion) tutorial
Author: Fuuujin
Description: A tutorial for absolute beginners on how to upload a ready-to-upload tutorial that you bought on Gumroad, Booth, etc.

Name: World Image Guide, including a Template
Author: Maebbie
Description: Align your World Thumbnail with great precision, to make the most of your window to the playerbase of VRChat. This Guide showcases an easy to use Template, that you can use to fit your existing thumbnail or as reference for a new one. There are also some tips on what to look out for.

Name: What is PBR?

It will cover two methods--one where the audio varies in pitch based on collision speed, and another in which the speed determines which audio clip to play from a list.

This tutorial will go over some basic concepts such as variables, Booleans, IF/ELSE statements in CyanTrigger, and how to use CyanTrigger variables between multiple gameobjects.

Author: Fionna

Name: VRChat Linking Bot
Author: miner28_3
Description: VRChatLinking is a free Discord bot and website service that enables users to link their VRChat and Discord accounts. This integration grants users access to special features and content provided by world creators, enhancing their experience within the VRChat platform. VRChatLinking empowers world creators by allowing them to adjust various settings and configurations through the website, change the format, and decide what users from their discord get included in the generated JSON. It also allows for connecting a VRChat Group to a Discord server and enables automatic group invites.

Name: UdonProfiler

Name: SDK Tools

Name: FlexiCurve

Name: VR RefAssist

Very powerful to automate Singleton references and running specific code when building or entering play mode.

Name: VRC Avatar World Template
Author: NanoBunTV

A rework of the VRChat Home Kit package for use as a VRChat Avatar World, to help give a base for Avatar creators to build from and create their own Avatar world.

Many Avatar creators have no clue how to use the Worlds SDK, that is exactly why I put together this package.
Notes: This is a full package and is not exactly meant to be imported into anything other than a FRESH project.

Name: Pretty Buttons Pack
Author: tsuna moo
Description:
These are buttons set up for VRChat.
There are 9 different ones in two versions.

The can be used both networked and not networked.
It is possible to toggle objects and launch animators with them.

All the buttons are animated with movement and colors.
You do not need to know how to make Udon Graphs or Scripts to use these.

This pack includes a custom standard shader.
To see the Material UI you need to install this:
https://github.com/Thryrallo/ThryEditor

The Shader can be edited using Amplify Shader Editor.

This is an updated version of the Tsuna Prefabs Buttons.
